strapiPost.title: Country Artist, Koe Wetzel Visits Walmart AMP Sept. 30
strapiPost.content:
Some artists break one or two rules. Koe Wetzel breaks pretty much all of them.

  • Grunge to glory: The Texas-born singer, songwriter, guitarist, and producer kicks out rock hooks with a twang bred in dives, yet meant for stadium stages. For as much as he trail-blazes between grunge, country, Americana style music, this maverick broke through the old-fashioned way - hard work.
  • Big time: Since 2015, Koe has had 100MM streams and views, and went from playing in bars to hosting and headlining his own Koe Wetzelâ€™s Incredible Music Festival. Wetzel will be performing for the first time at the Walmart AMP stage next Friday, Sept. 30. Come see this standout country artist with lawn tickets starting at $40.

Find out more about the show and buy tickets HERE.
